name: AS_GSS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField
description: Standard display for a primary record-list field, uses a larger size and strong rich text
sail_code:
if(
  a!defaultValue(ri!returnLinkComponent, false),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_recordLink(
    recordType: ri!recordType,
    recordId: ri!recordIdentifier,
    linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
    newTab: ri!newTab,
    siteWebAddressIdentifier: ri!siteWebAddressIdentifier,
    showWhen: ri!showLink,
    sitepage: ri!sitePage
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
    text: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: ri!icon), " " },
        showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!icon)
      ),
      ri!recordTitle,
      
    },
    link: if(
      ri!newTab,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_recordLink(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        recordId: ri!recordIdentifier,
        linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
        newTab: ri!newTab,
        siteWebAddressIdentifier: ri!siteWebAddressIdentifier,
        showWhen: ri!showLink,
        sitepage: ri!sitePage
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
        recordtype: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!recordIdentifier
      )
    ),
    linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
    size: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!size,
      replacementValue: "STANDARD"
    ),
    style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!style,
      replacementValue: "STRONG"
    ),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen
  )
)
